definition: the union of diverse things into one body or form or group
details:
noun
- the union of diverse things into one body or form or group
= synonyms: coalescence
- an increase in the density of something
= synonyms: compression
- a hard lump produced by the concretion of mineral salts
= synonyms: calculus
- the formation of stonelike objects within a body organ (e.g., the kidneys)
